translation.en: Basting me up in all this goo. What do you think I am? A Christmas goose? Get out of here!
translation.zh: 把我全身都涂满了恶心的油当我是圣诞火鸡吗？给我滚！

translation.en: Quickly, blow them out before the roses melt.
translation.zh: 赶紧把蜡烛吹熄吧不然玫瑰就融化了

translation.en: Roses can't melt, Papa. These ones can.
translation.zh: -爸爸 玫瑰是不会融化的-这种玫瑰会

translation.en: Now I'd like to propose a toast to our guest of honor,
translation.zh: 现在请举杯致敬我们的贵宾

translation.en: His Excellency, the Marquis de Montesquieu.
May our trade continue to flourish.
translation.zh: 祝愿我们的交易飞黄腾达

translation.en: -[man] Hear, hear! -[murmured approval]
[Marquis] I thank you all, and would ask of you the honor
translation.zh: 感谢大家 很荣幸能率先祝福

translation.en: to be the first to offer my congratulations
translation.zh: 很荣幸能率先祝福 您美丽的女儿生辰快乐

translation.en: to your beautiful daughter
translation.zh: 您美丽的女儿生辰快乐

translation.en: and present her with a small token of my affection.
translation.zh: 在此送上一份表达爱慕之意的小礼物

translation.en: [man 1] It's beautiful.
-[man 2] Splendid. -[woman] It's beautiful.
I'm overwhelmed, Your Grace.
translation.zh: 阁下 小女子受宠若惊了

translation.en: "Your Grace"?
I had hoped that we would be on more familiar terms by now.
translation.zh: 我还以为我们没那么陌生了

translation.en: Let's have a game of hide-and-seek. -Oh, yes! -[man] Oh, yes. But everyone must play.
translation.zh: -我们玩捉迷藏吧-好啊 大家都要玩

translation.en: [Marquis] Let the men catch the women.
translation.zh: 让男人去把女人找出来

translation.en: -[applause] -Bravo! -Bravo. -[women giggling]
[woman] Come on!
Put me down. Please?
[Marquis] Now there's no escape.
Game's over, everybody.
translation.zh: 各位来宾 游戏结束了

translation.en: Laura?
Time to go in now.
Laura?
[man] Albine? Françoise?
Laura, have you seen the twins?
translation.zh: 萝拉 你有没有看到那对双胞胎姐妹？

translation.en: No, not since the game started.
translation.zh: 没有 游戏开始后就再也没看到她们了

translation.en: [woman] Albine? Françoise?
Albine? Françoise? Jacques?
-Take this way. -You two, with me.
translation.zh: -你们去这边找-你们两个跟我来

translation.en: Your Excellency? Through here.
-[man 1] Albine. -[man 2] Girls, where are you?!
translation.zh: -艾嫔！-两个女儿 你们在哪里？

translation.en: -[man 3] Françoise! -[man 4] Albine!
[man 5] Françoise!
I told that cretin ten times to get these ready.
translation.zh: 我跟那个驴脑说过十遍了我叫他先准备好油膏台

translation.en: [chuckles] Don't keep picking on the boy.
translation.zh: 我跟那个驴脑说过十遍了我叫他先准备好油膏台 别老找那个小子麻烦

translation.en: I'll kill him, the useless little sewer rat.
translation.zh: 我要干掉那个没用的兔崽子

translation.en: Grenouille!
What are you doing? Why aren't the enfleurage frames...
translation.zh: 你在干什么？油膏台怎么还没…

translation.en: Yes, Master?
I mean, would you be good enough
translation.zh: -是 师傅-我是说… 让·巴蒂斯特可以麻烦你去帮我准备油膏台吗？

translation.en: to prepare the enfleurage frames, Jean-Baptiste?
translation.zh: 让·巴蒂斯特可以麻烦你去帮我准备油膏台吗？

translation.en: Certainly, master.
[man] Hey, look.
See? There.
A curfew? Are you mad?
translation.zh: 下宵禁令 你疯了吗？

translation.en: Jasmine can only be picked before dawn. We all know that.
translation.zh: 茉莉花只能够在黎明破晓前采收这点我们都知道的

translation.en: This could mean the ruin of our trade.
translation.zh: 这足以影响我们的生意

translation.en: Yours. And yours and yours.
translation.zh: 到时大家的生意都会受到影响

translation.en: Supposing it's your daughter next time?
translation.zh: 如果下次遇害的是你家女儿呢？

translation.en: Of course a curfew is necessary, but we also have to catch this man,
translation.zh: 宵禁是必然的但重点是要逮到这个家伙

translation.en: and the only way to do that is to understand how he thinks, what he wants.
translation.zh: 如果要逮到他就要搞清楚他的想法和目的

translation.en: [councilor] I should have thought that was obvious. Use your imagination.
translation.zh: 他的想法和目的很明显吧？请善用你的想象力

translation.en: And if I were to tell you that all except the prostitute
translation.zh: 如果我告诉你除了那个妓女之外

translation.en: went to their graves with their chastity intact?
translation.zh: 其他受害者都没失身呢？

translation.en: How would you know?
The coroner had each girl examined.
translation.zh: 验尸官给每个女受害者都验过身

translation.en: They were all found to be virgins.
Supposing there isn't a next time?
translation.zh: 假设这是凶手最后一次犯案

translation.en: If we introduce a curfew, we may all go bankrupt for nothing.
translation.zh: 如果我们下达宵禁令大家都可能会面临破产

translation.en: So we wait until he's killed, what, six, seven, eight?
translation.zh: 那要等到他杀了六、七、八个少女吗？

translation.en: -[woman] It's Pauline! -[officer] Curfew!
-Go back to your homes. -Stay inside.
It's a curfew. Back inside.
translation.zh: 宵禁时间到 都进屋吧！

translation.en: -[mayor] Gentlemen. Gentlemen. -[murmuring]
We have to face the fact that our police are helpless in this matter.
translation.zh: 我们要面对现实捕快们对此完全束手无策

translation.en: I suggest that we ask for support from Paris.
translation.zh: 我建议我们向巴黎求援

translation.en: -[man 1] Paris won't be smarter. -[man 2] We must arrest every Gypsy in Provence.
translation.zh: 巴黎人没比我们聪明 我们把所有吉普赛人和乞丐都抓起来

translation.en: -And every beggar. -[man 3] And every man without a wife and family.
translation.zh: 我们把所有吉普赛人和乞丐都抓起来 没有家室的和无家可归的男人也都抓起来

translation.en: Listen.
We have to put ourselves inside the mind of this man.
translation.zh: 我们要从凶手的角度去思考

translation.en: Each of his victims had an especial beauty.
translation.zh: 每个受害者都有其独特之美

translation.en: We know he doesn't want their virginity, so it seems to me that it's their beauty itself that he wants.
translation.zh: 我们都知道他不要她们的贞操所以他要的是她们的美

translation.en: It's almost as if he's trying to gather something.
translation.zh: 他好像在收集什么东西

translation.en: As if his ambitions are those of a collector.
A collector? Of what?
Their hair?
[woman] Get out! Get out of my store!
translation.zh: 滚出去 滚出我的店！

translation.en: You murdering scum!
Whatever it is, I fear he won't stop killing
until his collection is complete.
[man] There you are. Next. Quick as you can.
translation.zh: 拿去 下一个 快点

translation.en: Right. You, too.
-[servant] Monsieur. -[gasps]
[councilor] This man, this man is a demon.
A phantom who cannot be fought by human means.
translation.zh: 是凡人无法对抗的幽灵！

translation.en: Now, I insist that we call upon our bishop to excommunicate him.
translation.zh: 我坚决要求主教把他驱逐出教会！

translation.en: -[crowd murmuring] -What good would that do?
Have you no faith in the power of our Holy Mother Church?
translation.zh: 你难道对圣母院的神圣力量没信心吗？

translation.en: [Richis] This is not a matter of faith. There's a murderer out there
translation.zh: 这不是信心的问题外面有个杀人凶手

translation.en: and we must catch him by using our God-given wits.
translation.zh: 我必须用上帝给我们的智慧将他绳之于法

translation.en: [councilor] I say until we submit to Mother Church,
translation.zh: 我认为除非我们服从于圣母院

translation.en: these killings will not cease.
[bishop] Citizens of Grasse, we hereby declare that this murderer,
translation.zh: 各位格拉斯城的民众我们在此宣布 这位凶手

translation.en: this demon in our midst,
translation.zh: 这位藏在我们中间的魔鬼

translation.en: has incurred the sentence of excommunication!
translation.zh: 已经受到惩罚 从此被逐出教会

translation.en: Not only has this depraved monster
robbed us of our daughters,
translation.zh: 不仅带走了我们的女儿

translation.en: the young and fair blossom of this city,
translation.zh: 带走了这座城市豆蔻年华的美貌女子

translation.en: and by his wanton acts
has brought our trade, our livelihood,
nay, our very existence,
to the brink of eternal darkness.
We therefore declare that this vile viper,
translation.zh: 因此 我们宣布 这个歹毒之人

translation.en: this ignominious carbuncle,
this execrable evil in our midst
translation.zh: 这个藏在我们中间的邪灵

translation.en: shall henceforth be solemnly banned from our holy presence,
translation.zh: 从今以后被正式逐出圣地

translation.en: rejected from the communion of Holy Mother Church,
translation.zh: 不得再领受圣母院的圣餐

translation.en: as a disciple of Satan, slayer of souls.
translation.zh: 因为他是撒旦的信徒 是屠杀生灵的刽子手

translation.en: [rider] Stand clear! Stand clear!
[bishop] An infected limb, an outsider of the faith,
translation.zh: 是腐烂的灵魂 是叛教者

translation.en: a necromancer, a diabolist,
translation.zh: 是巫师 是崇拜撒旦之人

translation.en: a sorcerer
and a damned heretic.
Oh, God, in Thy most merciful spirit,
translation.zh: 主啊 求你大发慈悲

translation.en: bring down thunderbolts upon his head
and may the Devil make soup of his bones.
translation.zh: 让他下地狱 万劫不复

translation.en: -Amen! -My Lord!
My Lord! It's a miracle.
He's been caught. He's been caught.
My Lord, the fiend has been caught. In the city of Grenoble.
translation.zh: 大人 那个恶魔已经在格勒诺布尔城被捕了

translation.en: He's confessed to everything.
He's confessed to everything!
Hallelujah.
-Hallelujah! -[all] Hallelujah!
[bishop] Praise be to God.
And we thank Him for listening to our prayers and answering them.
translation.zh: 感谢主聆听且回应我们的祷告

translation.en: Amen!
[all] Amen!
[woman] Amen!
[Richis] Just read the report. This cannot possibly be the same man.
translation.zh: 你看一下报告 他不可能是凶手

translation.en: He confessed to everything.
Including the murders in Grasse.
translation.zh: 他还承认格拉斯城的少女是他杀的

translation.en: Yes. Under torture.
translation.zh: 没错 他是被屈打成招的

translation.en: Look. Here.
He admits to strangling his victims,
pulling out their hair and ravaging them.
translation.zh: 便扯下她们的头发 还蹂躏她们

translation.en: The girls of Grasse were killed by a single blow to the back of their heads,
translation.zh: 格拉斯城的少女是头部受到一击重创而死的

translation.en: their hair was carefully cropped, and not one of them was violated.
translation.zh: 她们的头发是被精心剪下而且并未被强暴过

translation.en: Antoine, we're all happy it's over.
translation.zh: 她们的头发是被精心剪下而且并未被强暴过 安托万 我们都很高兴已经结案了

translation.en: Let it go.
-Papa, what's the matter? -We're going home.
-Now. -But why? I'm enjoying myself.
translation.zh: -爸爸 怎么了？-马上回去！ -为什么？我玩得正起劲呢-别闹了 萝拉

translation.en: -Don't argue with me, Laura. -Stop it. I'm going--
translation.zh: -为什么？我玩得正起劲呢-别闹了 萝拉 放手 我要…

translation.en: Laura!
Laura!
Out of my way! Laura!
Laura!
Papa.
[Richis] I'm so sorry.
I know you must think me a very foolish man,
translation.zh: 你肯定认为我是个很愚蠢的男人吧？

translation.en: but try to understand.
translation.zh: 但希望你能了解爸爸的心情

translation.en: You're all I have left. You don't need to explain, Papa.
translation.zh: -爸爸只有你这个亲人-爸爸 你不用解释

translation.en: If anything were to happen to you... I know.
But you must stop worrying about me all the time.
translation.zh: 可是你不能时时刻刻都在担心我

translation.en: Sweet dreams, my love.
Sweet dreams, Papa.
Laura!
Papa, what's the matter?
Did you open the window?
No. Why?
[woman] Make sure all the furniture's covered...
translation.zh: 确保所有家具都覆盖好了

translation.en: Have this letter dispatched to the Marquis de Montesquieu immediately.
translation.zh: 马上将这封信寄给孟德斯鸠侯爵

translation.en: [woman] Marie? Quickly!
Steady.
Stay on the road north into the mountains.
Did Monsieur Richis leave? He did.
Which way?
North.
You sure it wasn't south? I saw them with my own eyes.
translation.zh: -你确定不是往南吗？-我亲眼看见的

translation.en: Why do you want to know?
I said north. North!
Grenouille?
Grenouille?
[worker] It doesn't feel flat. There we go.
[Druot] Grenouille?
Grenouille?
Good God.
[innkeeper] Good afternoon, Monsieur.
Good afternoon. Do you have anyone else staying here?
translation.zh: 下午好 旅馆里还有其他人住吗？

translation.en: No, Monsieur.
Then I would like to take all your rooms for the night.
translation.zh: 那我今晚包下你们旅馆所有客房

translation.en: [innkeeper] It will be our pleasure, Monsieur.
translation.zh: 那我今晚包下你们旅馆所有客房 大人 服务您是我们的荣幸

translation.en: And tomorrow, at first light, we wish to be ferried to the Ile de Lérin.
translation.zh: 明早天一亮 我们就会乘船去列亨岛

translation.en: It's deserted, except for a few monks. I'm aware of that.
translation.zh: -那个地方人烟稀少 只有几个修女-我知道

translation.en: Very well, Monsieur.
[woman] Our finest room, Mademoiselle.
translation.zh: 小姐 这是本旅馆最好的房间

translation.en: With a superb view of the sea.
One moment.
Very well.
Do you have a room next to this one?
Yes, but the view cannot be compared-- I have no interest in the view.
translation.zh: -有 只是景观无法媲美…-我对景观不感兴趣

translation.en: [woman, sobbing] Oh... God.
Monsieur.
Papa, will you please tell me now what's happening?
translation.zh: 爸爸 求你告诉我究竟怎么回事

translation.en: You haven't said a word all day. Why all this secrecy?
translation.zh: 你一整天都没说话为什么神秘兮兮的？

translation.en: Last night I dreamt you were dead.
translation.zh: 昨晚 我梦见你死了

translation.en: Murdered. Like all the other girls.
translation.zh: 被杀了 就跟其他女孩一样

translation.en: And the truth is, I'm convinced that the killer is still here somewhere.
translation.zh: 说真的 我很肯定凶手还逍遥法外

translation.en: All of his victims were young and beautiful
translation.zh: 死在他手下的人都是美貌少女

translation.en: and who is there more beautiful than you, Laura?
translation.zh: 萝拉 你说城里还有比你更美貌的女子吗？

translation.en: Whatever his insane scheme,
it will surely be incomplete without you.
translation.zh: 总是没有你就无法完成

translation.en: I've written to the Marquis, accepting his proposal of marriage on your behalf
translation.zh: 我已经写信给侯爵替你答应了他的求婚

translation.en: and requesting that it take place as soon as possible.
translation.zh: 你们很快就会举行婚礼

translation.en: Until then, you'll stay in the safety of the monastery.
translation.zh: 在那之前你只能住在那间修道院里

translation.en: And all this because you had a bad dream?
translation.zh: 就因为你做了一个噩梦？

translation.en: I've made my decision. But I don't know whether I even love him.
translation.zh: -我已经决定了-但我还不清楚我爱不爱他

translation.en: I'm afraid the circumstances leave us no choice.
-Papa. -It's all arranged, Laura.
translation.zh: -我们别无选择-爸爸 萝拉 一切都安排好了

translation.en: [guard] On your feet! Hands in the air!
Why did you kill my daughter?
Why?
I needed her.
Why did you kill my daughter?
I just...
needed her.
Very well.
But remember this.
I'll be looking at you...
when you're laid on the cross
and the 12 blows are crashing down on your limbs.
translation.zh: 看着你被铁棍重打十二下直到四肢残废为止

translation.en: And when the crowd has finally tired of your screams and wandered home...
translation.zh: 等围观的群众听厌你的尖叫声纷纷回家后

translation.en: I will climb up through your blood...
and sit beside you.
I will look deep into your eyes...
and, drop by drop...
I will trickle my disgust into them...
translation.zh: 把我的恨意灌入你眼里

translation.en: like burning acid...
translation.zh: 就像往你眼里灌入滚烫的硫酸那样

translation.en: until...
finally...
you perish.
[woman] What do you think they'll do to him?
translation.zh: 你认为他们会怎么处置他？

translation.en: [man] Apparently they're gonna break every bone in his body with an iron bar.
translation.zh: 他们肯定会用铁棍重打他直到他全身筋骨断裂为止

translation.en: -[woman 2] Filthy piece of bile. -[crowd arguing]
translation.zh: 你这个肮脏的东西 管好你自己吧！

translation.en: [woman 3] Mind your own business!
translation.zh: 管好你自己吧！ 蠢货！

translation.en: Look, there he comes.
[man 1] To hell with him! Where he belongs!
translation.zh: 送他下地狱吧那才是他该待的地方！

translation.en: [man 2] Hit him hard with that!
Unchain the prisoner.
That's enough.
Let him be brought to the scaffold.
What's that?
Gloria Patri et Filio et Spiritu Sancti.
translation.zh: 愿荣耀归于圣父、圣子和圣灵

translation.en: Amen.
[woman] Is he coming? What is it?
This man is innocent.
-He didn't do it. It's impossible. -He's innocent!
translation.zh: -他是无辜的 他不可能是凶手！-他是无辜的！

translation.en: -[woman] Look at him! -[man] He's innocent!
An angel.
This is no man, this is an angel!
I love you!
[Richis] Grenouille!
You can't fool me!
Forgive me...
my son.
[narrator] The people of Grasse awoke to a terrible hangover.
translation.zh: 格拉斯城的民众醒过来时感觉就像经历了严重的宿醉

translation.en: For many of them, the experience was so ghastly,
translation.zh: 对许多人而言这是一段不堪回首的经历

translation.en: so completely inexplicable and incompatible with their morals,
translation.zh: 这段经历太匪夷所思完全颠覆了他们的道德价值观

translation.en: that they literally erased it from their memories.
translation.zh: 以致于他们很自然地将这段经历从记忆中抹去

translation.en: The town council was in session by the afternoon
translation.zh: 市议会当天下午就召开了会议

translation.en: and an order was passed to the police lieutenant
to immediately begin fresh investigations into the murders. I'm innocent! This is madness.
translation.zh: 重新立案调查这起连环谋杀案

translation.en: [narrator] The following day, Dominique Druot was arrested
translation.zh: 隔天 多米尼克·德鲁被捕

translation.en: since it was in his backyard that the clothes and hair of all the victims had been found.
translation.zh: 因为死者的衣物和头发是在他家后院发现的

translation.en: After 14 hours of torture, Druot confessed to everything.
translation.zh: 经历了14个小时的严刑拷问德鲁屈打成招

translation.en: With that, the case was closed.
By then, Grenouille was already halfway back to Paris.
translation.zh: 这个时候格雷诺耶已经在回巴黎的路上

translation.en: He still had enough perfume left
to enslave the whole world if he so chose.
translation.zh: 足以奴役全世界的人类

translation.en: He could walk to Versailles and have the King kiss his feet.
translation.zh: 他大可大摇大摆地走进凡尔赛宫让国王亲吻他的脚

translation.en: He could write the Pope a perfumed letter and reveal himself as the new Messiah.
translation.zh: 抑或写信给教宗宣称自己是新的救世主

translation.en: He could do all this and more if he wanted to.
translation.zh: 天下没有他做不到的事

translation.en: He possessed a power stronger than the power of money, or terror, or death.
translation.zh: 他拥有比金钱、恐惧和死亡更大的力量

translation.en: The invincible power to command the love of mankind.
translation.zh: 这股无形的力量足以征服爱

translation.en: There was only one thing the perfume could not do.
translation.zh: 只有一件事是这瓶香水做不到的

translation.en: It could not turn him into a person who could love and be loved like everyone else.
translation.zh: 就是它无法把他变成一个有能力去爱和为人所爱的凡人

translation.en: So, to hell with it, he thought.
To hell with the world.
translation.zh: 就跟这个世界一起去死吧

translation.en: With the perfume.
With himself.
On the 25th of June, 1766, around eleven o'clock at night,
Grenouille entered the city through the Porte d'Orléans
translation.zh: 格雷诺耶走过奥尔良港来到了市中心

translation.en: and, like a sleepwalker,
his olfactory memories drew him back to the place where he was born.
translation.zh: 他的嗅觉记忆把他带回他出生的地方

translation.en: An angel!
I love you.
[narrator] Within no time, Jean-Baptiste Grenouille had disappeared from the face of the Earth.
